page.title: 11 Bruton Playschool.
page.content: The playschool is an established part of life in our area and many children aged between three and four years benefit from it's activities, about twenty children go each morning.The organisers feel it's important for young children to get to know each other and to learn to share things. The children take part in activities like painting, puzzles, sticking, singing, listening to stories and playing in the Wendy House. At the moment playschool costs Â£1 a session. The leader enjoys working with the children,finding them particularly interesting at that age.
